name: com.yohash.propulsion
description: A collection of scripts to enable physics-based propulsion

samples.description: A sample controller that compares 3 PID controllers to a backwards PD controller to physically match a target's position
A sample controller that uses a stable backward PD controller to physically rotate a turret to point at a target while maintaining an "Up" rotation
This sample controller applies inputs to the vehicle motor to drive a car
This example uses the Vehicle PD controller as an AI which matches a user-controlled vehicle
